item.title: PF pfctl cheat sheet
item.description: Pobrane z https://gist.github.com/tracphil/4353170 1# basic pfctl control 2# == 3# Related: http://www.OpenBSD.org 4# Last update: Tue Dec 28, 2004 5# == 6# Note: 7# this document is only provided as a basic overview 8# for some common pfctl commands and is by no means 9# a replacement for the pfctl and pf manual pages. 10 11#### General PFCTL Commands #### 12# pfctl -d disable packet-filtering 13# pfctl -e enable packet-filtering 14# pfctl -q run quiet 15# pfctl -v -v run even more verbose 16 17#### Loading PF Rules #### 18# pfctl -f /etc/pf.
